original_text: On the tenth day of the fifth month some of Israel's leaders came to me. That was in the seventh year that we had been prisoners in Babylon. The leaders sat in front of me. They wanted me to ask for a message from the Lord.
korean_text: 일곱째 해 다섯째 달 열째 날에 이스라엘 장로 여러 사람이 여호와께 물으려고 와서 내 앞에 앉으니

sentences.original_text: On the tenth day of the fifth month
some of Israel's leaders came to me
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 지도자 몇 사람이 내게 왔다

sentences.original_text: That was in the seventh year
that we had been prisoners in Babylon
The leaders sat in front of me
They wanted me to ask for a message
